short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to generate Temp Mail - Disposable email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A disposable email is typically a temporary email address that is used only once and often for a short period of time. Disposable email addresses can be used in place of your personal email address and can help protect your privacy by preventing spam or unwanted mail. They are convenient when signing up for many websites or services and can be automatically deleted after a few hours or a few days.
